anathema: Accidentally injure others with your size, topple a massive natural monument, use magic to assume a form smaller than you are
edict: Grow as large as you can, shelter those smaller and weaker than you, tend large animals and megafauna

<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Balumbdar (The World-Shaker)](/Deities.aspx?ID=674)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 17

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Mwangi Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=20)

**Edicts** Grow as large as you can, shelter those smaller and weaker than you, tend large animals and megafauna

**Anathema** Accidentally injure others with your size, topple a massive natural monument, use magic to assume a form smaller than you are

**Area of Concern**
Great size, megafauna, strength

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<column gap="tiny">

Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** none

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

**Favored Weapon** [Greatclub](/Weapons.aspx?ID=377)

**Domains** [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [Perfection](/Domains.aspx?ID=89), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Ant Haul](/Spells.aspx?ID=1442)

- **2nd**
[Enlarge](/Spells.aspx?ID=1514)

- **4th**
[Dinosaur Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=1489)

</column>
